summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the preparation of plans, specifications and cost estimates for that portion of the Lake Union - South - Unit \#1 Sewer Improvement Project, Contract 3, covering the separation of combined sewers in Minor Avenue from Columbia Street to Marion Street and Marion Street from Minor Avenue to Boren Avenue - adjacent to the Swedish Hospital Medical Center; authorizing the acquisition of rights of entry for reconnection of existing side sewers and service drains, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
